title: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Wilson's Creek National Battlefield Artillery Battery Program      Time: 11:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Tour Road Stop Number 5     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Programs highlighting the role of field artillery batteries during the Civil War. View Details      Wilson's Creek National Battlefield National Park Service Birthday Weekend      Location: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Everyday  from 08/25/2016 to 08/28/2016 National Park Service Birthday Weekend View Details      Wilson's Creek National Battlefield The 3rd Louisiana at Wilson's Creek      Location: Stop 5 on the Tour Road  Fees: Entrance Fee     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Living history program View Details      Wilson's Creek National Battlefield Change to Fall Hours      Location: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield     Tuesday, September 6, 2016 Tour Road hours change to 8 a.m.-7 p.m. View Details              Wilson's Creek National Battlefield has many exciting, educational, and entertaining events planned for the National Park Service Centennial in 2016. The entire year's calendar of events can be seen by doing a search for events from January 1, 2016 to December 31, 2016. Come visit us and celebrate 100 years of America's best idea.
